item.title: Chatbot Roulette
item.description: There was some excitement online recently around “Freysa”, a contest which combined large language models (LLMs) with some sort of blockchain technology. The basic idea was for participants to interact with an LLM to try to get it to do a thing that it had been instructed not to do. The trick was that the cost of each attempt increased after every submission (up to some maximum), as did the potential reward.
